participant_1.background:
I still have my stuffed bunny from childhood, even though I'm 30.
i am committed to the environment.
My favorite people are those who share my love of game shows and fashion.
i work in construction.
i like to make clothes.

participant_2.background:
I don't have any kids, but I'm close to my family.
I collect interesting rocks that I find along my wheelchair paths.
I want to share my photography with the world.
I eat healthy meals and cook at home to make sure I am making the best choices for my health.
i like photography.

content.text: Hello!
Hi! How are you?
I'm well, thanks! How about you?
I'm doing great! Just got back from a photography trip to the mountains.
That sounds amazing! I've always wanted to go to the mountains.
You should! They're so beautiful. What do you like to do for fun?
I like to make clothes, play game shows, and spend time with my family.
That's awesome! I like to take photos, cook healthy meals, and spend time with my family.
I love cooking healthy meals too! It's so important to eat well.
I know right? My grandma always told me that an apple a day keeps the doctor away.
That's a good saying! I've always loved apples.
Me too! They're so sweet and delicious.
Do you have any siblings?
I have one brother. He's two years older than me.
That's awesome! I have one sister. She's three years younger than me.
That's great! I'm sure you guys are close.
We are! We're always there for each other.
That's what family is all about.
I know! I'm so grateful for my family.
Me too! They're the best
